vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σκέπ-ασμα, ατος, τό,
a covering, τῶν σ. ὑποπετάσματα μὲν ἄλλα, περικαλύμματα δὲ ἕτερα [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of a cap or shoe, [Refs]; of clothing generally, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; covering membrane, [Refs]; τὸ φύλλον περικαρπίου σ., in plants, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: clothing, covering; this can refer to shelter or personal covering
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
clothing, covering; this can refer to shelter or personal covering
covering; clothing, raiment, 1Tim. 6:8*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 覆蓋物, 特別指衣著 (提前 6:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 覆盖物, 特别指衣着 (提前 6:8)
